chart.title: Systems With OTX Tags Over Time

search.query: sourcetype=ziften:zenith:alert feed="otx"|lookup system_info agentguid |timechart count as "Systems With OTX Tags" by computername

sourcetype=ziften:zenith:alert feed=otx |stats dc(ipaddress) as "Unique Tagged IPs Seen" count(ipaddress) as "Gross Tagged IP Traffic Seen" dc(imagefilemd5) as "Unique MD5s With Associated Tags" by agentguid |lookup system_info agentguid|fields computername agentguid "Unique Tagged IPs Seen" "Gross Tagged IP Traffic Seen" "Unique MD5s With Associated Tags" |sort -"Unique Tagged IPs Seen"

sourcetype=ziften:zenith:alert feed=otx |where agentguid="$guid$" |stats count as "Gross Tagged IP Traffic Seen" values(details) as "OTX Tags" dc(imagefilemd5) as "Unique MD5s Tag Association" by ipaddress|makemv delim="," "OTX Tags"|sort -"Gross Tagged IP Traffic Seen"
